original_text: You people who live in the land will now receive terrible punishment. The day for that to happen is very near. There will be no more sound of happy parties on the mountains. Instead there will be shouts of fear.
korean_text: 이 땅 주민아 정한 재앙이 네게 임하도다 때가 이르렀고 날이 가까웠으니 요란한 날이요 산에서 즐거이 부르는 날이 아니로다

sentences.original_text: You people who live in the land
The day for that to happen
There will be no more sound of happy parties
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 즐거운 파티 소리가 없을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Instead there will be shouts of fear
